entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-07-09
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Properties for a class that extends Dictionary are not present in the JSON schema #56707
  • Re-write `.nuspec` files before running tests #56706
  • When running in RU locale "Microsoft" is being translated #56700
  • Visual Studio React and ASP.NET Core [Typescript] template fails to build upon creation #56699
  • Perf regression: ApiCrudListProducts #56698
  • Perf regression: fortunes_ef #56697
  • Perf improvement: json_spring #56696
  • Microsoft Security Advisory CVE-2024-35264 | .NET Remote Code Execution Vulnerability #56691
  • Minimal API Endpoint gives "Invalid antiforgery token" error #56687
  • [Blazor Webapp] Handling browser close/reload in server and wasm mode #56683

Closed

  • Fix template tests to run in CI #46430
    9.0-preview7
  • SignInManager.ValidateTwoFactorSecurityStampAsync is incorrectly passing userName to FindByIdAsync #56625
  • Perf regression: ApiCrudGetProductDetails #56682
  • Perf regression: plaintext #56650
  • Perf regression: endpoint, single_query #56681
  • Schema get duplicated for every request in open-api #56541
    9.0-preview7
  • System.Text.Json Wrong serialization after Newtonsoft migration #56686
  • Problem With some extensions like tronlink #56512
  • Add CreateNamedPipeServerStream to named pipes options #56568
  • NamedPipeTransportOptions should support multiple PipeSecurity (DACL) #53306

PullRequests

Created

  • Port "Lock around Http3Stream data frame processing" to `main` #56705
    area-networking
  • Port "Add direct references to S.T.J. in tools" to `main` #56704
    area-commandlinetools
  • AddConnections: AddRouting -> AddRoutingCore #56703
    area-signalr
  • Port fix for #53423 to `main` #56702
    area-security
  • Look up trusted certs consistently on windows #56701
    area-commandlinetools

Merged

  • [Blazor] Fix template tests #54606
    area-infrastructure, 9.0-preview7
  • Removing unsafe parts of Decode method in QueryStringEnumerable #56630
    Perf, community-contribution, area-networking, 9.0-preview7
  • Merging internal commits for release/6.0 #56694
    area-infrastructure, 6.0.33
  • Merging internal commits for release/8.0 #56693
    area-infrastructure, 8.0.8
  • Fix typos #56530
    community-contribution, area-networking, 9.0-preview7
  • Scrub extension properties in OpenAPI document during serialization #56688
    area-mvc, feature-openapi, area-minimal, 9.0-preview7
  • Add CreateNamedPipeServerStream to named pipes options #56567
    area-networking, 9.0-preview7
  • Update .NET SDK to 9.0.100-preview.7.24358.2 #56667
    area-infrastructure, Type: Dependency Update :arrow_up_small:, 9.0-preview7

Updated

  • [release/6.0] Bump to macos-12 build image #56273
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, pending-ci-rerun, 6.0.x
  • Add support for trusting dev certs on linux #56582
    area-networking
  • Revert "Quarantine flaky MVC functional tests (#55935)" #56615
    area-mvc
  • Improve performance of UriHelper.GetDisplayUrl #55611
    Perf, community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun, area-networking
  • Enable internal runtimes and disable old creds #56428
    area-infrastructure, pending-ci-rerun
  • Add requirements comment to update-npm-dependencies #56670
    area-infrastructure
  • Add OpenAPI operation and schema transformer interfaces #56395
    community-contribution, feature-openapi, area-web-frameworks
  • Navigation Exception: Introduce Clear Message & Helper Class #56644
    area-blazor, community-contribution, pr: pending author input
  • Use char overloads to Join/Index strings #56531
    community-contribution, area-networking, 9.0-preview7
  • Use pattern matching #56532
    community-contribution, area-networking, 9.0-preview7
  • Add disable HTTP metrics endpoint metadata #56036
    area-hosting
  • Updated naming pattern used the s_ prefix for private static fields #56647
    area-infrastructure, community-contribution
